01: Live TV.longDescription: TNT is an American basic cable television channel owned by Warner Bros. that launched on October 3, 1988. TNT's original purpose was to air classic films and television series to which Turner Broadcasting maintained spillover rights through its sister station TBS. Since June 2001, the network has shifted its focus to dramatic television series and feature films, along with some sporting events (including NBA, NHL, the NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament and professional wrestling show AEW Rampage), as TBS shifted its focus to comedic programming.

04: Comedy.longDescription: After the members of a team of scientists (Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray) lose their cushy positions at a university in New York City, they decide to become "ghostbusters" to wage a high-tech battle with the supernatural for money. They stumble upon a gateway to another dimension, a doorway that will release evil upon the city. The Ghostbusters must now save New York from complete destruction.

04: Comedy.longDescription: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

04: Comedy.longDescription: He's the wrong person, at the wrong place, at the wrong time. Joe Dirt (David Spade) is a janitor with a mullet hairdo, acid-washed jeans and a dream -- to find the parents that he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was eight. As his wandering, misguided search takes him from one misadventure to another, he finds his way to Los Angeles, where a shock-jock (Dennis Miller) brings Joe on the radio to insult him. But as Joe's story unfolds, jeers turn to cheers, and an entire city is captivated.

10: TV Shows.title: Newhart
10: TV Shows.shortDescription: Dick Loudon and wife Joanna relocate from New York City to a small town in Vermont, where they run the historic Stafford Inn. They're surrounded by a town full of oddballs and colorful characters, whom Loudon deals with in various states of bemusement.

episodes.title: In the Beginning
episodes.shortDescription: New York couple Dick and Joanna Loudon purchase the Stratford Inn in rural Vermont.
episodes.longDescription: New York couple Dick and Joanna Loudon purchase the Stratford Inn in rural Vermont.

episodes.title: Mrs. Newton's Body Lies A-Mould'ring in the Grave
episodes.shortDescription: Dick and Joanna are horrified to discover a 300 year-old grave in their basement belonging to a woman who was hanged as a witch.
episodes.longDescription: Dick and Joanna are horrified to discover a 300 year-old grave in their basement belonging to a woman who was hanged as a witch.

episodes.title: Hail to the Councilman
episodes.shortDescription: Dick is persuaded to run for the town council.
episodes.longDescription: Dick is persuaded to run for the town council.

episodes.title: Shall We Gather at the River?
episodes.shortDescription: Dick is in the doghouse when he persuades Joanna to attend the town's annual River Party and chaos ensues.
episodes.longDescription: Dick is in the doghouse when he persuades Joanna to attend the town's annual River Party and chaos ensues.

episodes.title: This Probably Is Condemned
episodes.shortDescription: The staff of the Stratford Inn pitch together to help Kirk get his café up to code after a surprise visit from the health inspector.
episodes.longDescription: The staff of the Stratford Inn pitch together to help Kirk get his café up to code after a surprise visit from the health inspector.

episodes.title: No Tigers at the Circus
episodes.shortDescription: Dick becomes disenchanted with the Stratford when its application to be made a historical landmark is denied.
episodes.longDescription: Dick becomes disenchanted with the Stratford when its application to be made a historical landmark is denied.

episodes.title: The Perfect Match
episodes.shortDescription: Kirk is jealous when an old flame of Leslie's appears with a proposal.
episodes.longDescription: Kirk is jealous when an old flame of Leslie's appears with a proposal.

episodes.title: Some Are Born Writers... Others Have Writers Thrust Upon Them
episodes.shortDescription: Dick reluctantly helps an aspiring author make it in the business.
episodes.longDescription: Dick reluctantly helps an aspiring author make it in the business.

episodes.title: No Room at the Inn
episodes.shortDescription: Dick and Joanna's much-awaited first Christmas in Vermont ends up being not so traditional after all when a massive snowstorm strands them and everyone else at the Stratford.
episodes.longDescription: Dick and Joanna's much-awaited first Christmas in Vermont ends up being not so traditional after all when a massive snowstorm strands them and everyone else at the Stratford.

episodes.title: The Senator's Wife Was Indiscreet
episodes.shortDescription: Dick and Joanna play marriage counselors when the flaky wife of a senator leaves her husband and comes to the Stratford.
episodes.longDescription: Dick and Joanna play marriage counselors when the flaky wife of a senator leaves her husband and comes to the Stratford.

episodes.title: Sprained Dreams
episodes.shortDescription: Kirk has a date with Leslie. Dick decides he wants to go skiing but since he doesn't know how to ski he gets Leslie to go since she's an Olympic skiing hopeful. One thing leads to another and she winds up with a knee injury that will probably end her dreams. Kirk and all of Leslie's school friends wind up angry with Dick.
episodes.longDescription: Kirk has a date with Leslie. Dick decides he wants to go skiing but since he doesn't know how to ski he gets Leslie to go since she's an Olympic skiing hopeful. One thing leads to another and she winds up with a knee injury that will probably end her dreams. Kirk and all of Leslie's school friends wind up angry with Dick.

episodes.title: The Way We Thought We Were
episodes.shortDescription: George is dismayed when an old flame returns after thirty-one years and has changed completely.
episodes.longDescription: George is dismayed when an old flame returns after thirty-one years and has changed completely.

episodes.title: The Visitors
episodes.shortDescription: Dick and Joanna feel left out when some old friends visit the Inn but spend no time with them.
episodes.longDescription: Dick and Joanna feel left out when some old friends visit the Inn but spend no time with them.

episodes.title: What Is This Thing Called Lust?
episodes.shortDescription: Leslie's cousin is about to be wed and has set her lustful sights on next-door Kirk for some passion in her life.
episodes.longDescription: Leslie's cousin is about to be wed and has set her lustful sights on next-door Kirk for some passion in her life.

episodes.title: Breakfast Theatre
episodes.shortDescription: An aging, unfunny comic who is an old friend of Dick's uses the Stratford to jump start his career, despite Joanna's objections.
episodes.longDescription: An aging, unfunny comic who is an old friend of Dick's uses the Stratford to jump start his career, despite Joanna's objections.

episodes.title: Ricky Nelson, Up Your Nose
episodes.shortDescription: While Kirk goes in for surgery, Larry, Darryl and Darryl mind the Minuteman Café.
episodes.longDescription: While Kirk goes in for surgery, Larry, Darryl and Darryl mind the Minuteman Café.

episodes.title: A View from the Bench
episodes.shortDescription: Dick, George and Kirk embark on a trip to Boston to attend a Celtics game, meanwhile Joanna and Leslie prepare for the arrival of a celebrity at the Inn.
episodes.longDescription: Dick, George and Kirk embark on a trip to Boston to attend a Celtics game, meanwhile Joanna and Leslie prepare for the arrival of a celebrity at the Inn.

episodes.title: The Boy Who Cried Goat
episodes.shortDescription: Kirk must take a lie detector test to prove his claims that the Minuteman Café was robbed.
episodes.longDescription: Kirk must take a lie detector test to prove his claims that the Minuteman Café was robbed.

episodes.title: Heaven Knows Mr. Utley
episodes.shortDescription: George becomes the joke of the town after he spies a UFO and nobody believes him.
episodes.longDescription: George becomes the joke of the town after he spies a UFO and nobody believes him.

episodes.title: You're Homebody 'til Somebody Loves You
episodes.shortDescription: When Dick labels her a homebody, Joanna decides to return to the workforce.
episodes.longDescription: When Dick labels her a homebody, Joanna decides to return to the workforce.

episodes.title: Grandma, What a Big Mouth You Have
episodes.shortDescription: Kirk finally manages to get a date with Leslie when his grandmother arrives for a visit.
episodes.longDescription: Kirk finally manages to get a date with Leslie when his grandmother arrives for a visit.

episodes.title: I Enjoy Being a Guy
episodes.shortDescription: After winning big at golf and poker, Dick tries desperately to lose his new winnings, meanwhile George convinces Kirk to take him clothes shopping.
episodes.longDescription: After winning big at golf and poker, Dick tries desperately to lose his new winnings, meanwhile George convinces Kirk to take him clothes shopping.

10: TV Shows.title: Amazing Stories
10: TV Shows.shortDescription: Truly amazing, fantastical, funny, and odd, and sometimes scary, sad, and endearing stories are portrayed. Many famous actors, actresses, and directors made guest appearances.

episodes.title: Ghost Train
episodes.shortDescription: Opa Globe is convinced it is his destiny to board a train he inadvertently caused to crash 75 years ago, and tells his nine-year old grandson the old Highball Express will careen through their house.
episodes.longDescription: Opa Globe is convinced it is his destiny to board a train he inadvertently caused to crash 75 years ago, and tells his nine-year old grandson the old Highball Express will careen through their house.

episodes.title: The Main Attraction
episodes.shortDescription: Athletic teenage hunk Brad Bender thinks he is too cool for nerdy classmate Shirley, who is crazy over him, until, to his horror, a meteor shower's power suddenly turns him into a human magnet.
episodes.longDescription: Athletic teenage hunk Brad Bender thinks he is too cool for nerdy classmate Shirley, who is crazy over him, until, to his horror, a meteor shower's power suddenly turns him into a human magnet.

episodes.title: Alamo Jobe
episodes.shortDescription: During the Battle of the Alamo on March 6, 1836, 15-year-old messenger Jobe H. Farnum is about to be killed. He is transported forward in time to San Antonio in 1985. The 1980s prove to be too much for Jobe to handle.
episodes.longDescription: During the Battle of the Alamo on March 6, 1836, 15-year-old messenger Jobe H. Farnum is about to be killed. He is transported forward in time to San Antonio in 1985. The 1980s prove to be too much for Jobe to handle.

episodes.title: Mummy Daddy
episodes.shortDescription: A dedicated actor in a realistic mummy costume that he can't take off is shooting a movie in a swamp. When he hears his wife is in labor, he runs towards the town but the local rednecks think he's the real deal and form a posse.
episodes.longDescription: A dedicated actor in a realistic mummy costume that he can't take off is shooting a movie in a swamp. When he hears his wife is in labor, he runs towards the town but the local rednecks think he's the real deal and form a posse.

episodes.title: The Mission
episodes.shortDescription: A courageous young World War II gunner and aspiring cartoonist, trapped in the belly gun of a B-17 aircraft with the landing gear destroyed, has only his imagination as a force that might be able to save him.
episodes.longDescription: A courageous young World War II gunner and aspiring cartoonist, trapped in the belly gun of a B-17 aircraft with the landing gear destroyed, has only his imagination as a force that might be able to save him.

episodes.title: The Amazing Falsworth
episodes.shortDescription: A nightclub audience gasps at The Amazing Falsworth's psychic powers, but the shock is his alone when the blindfolded performer picks up the vibes of a serial killer in the room.
episodes.longDescription: A nightclub audience gasps at The Amazing Falsworth's psychic powers, but the shock is his alone when the blindfolded performer picks up the vibes of a serial killer in the room.

episodes.title: Fine Tuning
episodes.shortDescription: Three high-school kids build an antenna that can catch signals from outer space. They learn that the aliens are big fans of 1950s American television and are coming to Hollywood to meet some of their favorite Earth stars.
episodes.longDescription: Three high-school kids build an antenna that can catch signals from outer space. They learn that the aliens are big fans of 1950s American television and are coming to Hollywood to meet some of their favorite Earth stars.

11: Cartoons/Animation.title: What's New, Scooby-Doo?
11: Cartoons/Animation.shortDescription: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang are launched into the 21st century, with new mysteries to solve.

episodes.title: There's No Creature Like Snow Creature
episodes.shortDescription: A snow creature terrorizes snowboard competitors.
episodes.longDescription: A snow creature terrorizes snowboard competitors.

episodes.title: 3-D Struction
episodes.shortDescription: A dinosaur literally leaps off of the movie screen in a Costa Rican museum.
episodes.longDescription: A dinosaur literally leaps off of the movie screen in a Costa Rican museum.
